definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: get, acquire (NH=BH; Ph. (Pun.) [[מקנא]], property [in cattle]; As. ḳanû, gain, acquire, Meissn:Suppl. 85; Ar. qana0 (w, y) acquire, procure; Sab. [[קני]] acquire, possess, CIS:iv,no.89, 5.6, [[קני]] n. property Id:ib,no.3, 8, 29, 3; Eth.qanaya acquire, subjugate; Aram. [[קְנָא]], qno0 (accquire) ;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of God as originating, creating, [[קׂנֵה שָׁמַיִם וׇאָרֶץ]] Ge 14:19, Ge 14:22, De 32:6 (Isr.), Ps 139:13 ([[כִּלְיׁתָָי]]); Pr 8:22 ([[חכמה]] q.v.).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of God as victoriously redeeming his people Ex 15:16, Is 11:11, Ps 74:2 (‖[[גׇּאַל ]]) obj. [[הַר־וֶה]] Ps 78:54.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of Eve, acquiring [[קַיִן]], ´[[אֶת־י]]: (i.e. with the help of), Ge 4:1 (J).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: of acquiring wisdom, knowledge (only Pr.): Pr 1:5, Pr 4:5, Pr 4:5, Pr 4:7, Pr 4:7, Pr 15:32, Pr 16:16, Pr 16:16, Pr 17:16, Pr 18:15, Pr 19:8, Pr 23:23.
elsewhere buy Ex 21:2 (E), Ge 47:22 (J), Ge 50:13 (P), Le 27:24(H), De 28:68, Is 24:2, Je 13:1, Ez Eze 7:12, Pr 20:14 +; [[קׂנֶה]] owner, as purchaser Le 25:30 (P) Is 1:3, Zec 11:5 +.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: be bought: Pf. 3 ms. [[נִקְנׇה]] Je 32:43; Impf. 3 mpl. [[יִקָּנוּ]] v:Je 32:15.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3ms. sf. [[אָדָם חִקְנַנִי]] Zec 13:5; AV makes denom. of [[מִקְנֶה]] cattle; Thes RV Marti:Kau Buhl caused (one) to purchase me, i.e. made me a bondman; < We now GASm read [[אֲרָמָה קִנְיׇנִי]]—Pt. [[מַקְנֶה]] v. [[קנא]].
